nodes.text: Fleet logistics liaison was an assignment aboard certain Imperial warships, including Star Destroyers. He or she liaised between the ship and the Imperial Navy's logistics corps, ensuring that the crew had the necessary supplies to stay fed, clothed, and in fighting shape. Although a desk job, it involved a lot of datawork that made it very stressful. Around 0 BBY, Arvira held that position aboard the Imperial I-class Star Destroyer Devastator.
